description: Number of ways to partition n elements into pie slices of different sizes.
links: Index entries for sequences related to Lyndon words
formula: "CGK" (necklace, element, unlabeled) transform of 1, 1, 1, 1...G.f.: Sum(k >= 1; (k-1)! x^((k^2+k)/2) / Prod(1<=j<=k; 1-x^j)) - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Sep 21 2004
mathematica: max=50; s=Sum[(x^(k(k+1)/2-1)*(k-1)!)/QPochhammer[x, x, k], {k, 1, max}] + O[x]^max; CoefficientList[s, x] (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Jan 19 2016 *)
author: _Christian G. Bower_
